column4: New Issue-Superior Energy Services sells $800 mln notes
column5: Nov 22 Superior Energy Services LLC on Monday sells $800 million of senior unsecured notes in the 144a private placement market  said IFR  a Thomson Reuters service.      The size of the deal increased from the originally planned $700 million.     J.P. Morgan  Bank of America Merrill Lynch and Wells Fargo were the joint bookrunning managers for the sale.
